Nan Copeland

Nan Copeland is a web designer from North Carolina living in Washington, D.C. She currently works for Industry Dive where she is focused on enhancing the newly-designed website and creating tools to improve the company's efficiency. When not working, she can often be found at The Wonderland Ballroom, Compass Coffee or the 9:30 Club.

Redesign mobile and desktop sites for Industry Dive's 12 publications.
